about_the_game:
Lone Wolf: A Post Apocalyptic Beat-Em Up Role Playing Game. This action/adventure game lets a player use martial arts skills, weapons, and turn into a werewolf to fight their way through a world set in the aftermath of post nuclear devastation.



This game was made with the love of the beat-em up arcade machines and console games of the 1980's and 1990's, taking some of the mechanics of these games mixed with some more modern gameplay.

Features:

  • Main character "Lone Wolf" can transform into a werewolf to tear apart enemies.
  • Main character "Brok" is a wrestler that can transform into a berserker hulk to crush enemies.
  • Characters have special fighting abilities, improving their skills transparently as you play.
  • Currently there are 28 playable weapons! Characters use weapons that they are skilled in, some can only be used by certain characters.
  • Playable characters can be AI driven and the AI can be customized per character, and switched to AI on the fly.
  • 6 Unique death animations per character, different special moves trigger the death animations on foes.
  • Sneak kills can be made in some shadowed areas of the game.
  • Story Mode with comic book style cutscenes.
  • Fighter mode to battle out with other players or computer controlled opponents.
  • 2D animation for the characters in a 3D environment give it a unique look and feel.
  • Couch co-op, up to 4 players.
  • Unlockable characters, Fighter levels, and a secret play mode.
  • Open world to explore and discover its secrets and have encounters with the denizens of the world in the aftermath.
  • NPC character interaction and dialogue, there are branching quests and event driven dialogues that the main character can progress through.
  • Customizable difficulty, camera control, controls style, and player input!

content_descriptors.notes:
Animated Violence and Gore.
Mature Language.

detailed_description:
Lone Wolf: A Post Apocalyptic Beat-Em Up Role Playing Game. This action/adventure game lets a player use martial arts skills, weapons, and turn into a werewolf to fight their way through a world set in the aftermath of post nuclear devastation.



This game was made with the love of the beat-em up arcade machines and console games of the 1980's and 1990's, taking some of the mechanics of these games mixed with some more modern gameplay.

Features:

  • Main character "Lone Wolf" can transform into a werewolf to tear apart enemies.
  • Main character "Brok" is a wrestler that can transform into a berserker hulk to crush enemies.
  • Characters have special fighting abilities, improving their skills transparently as you play.
  • Currently there are 28 playable weapons! Characters use weapons that they are skilled in, some can only be used by certain characters.
  • Playable characters can be AI driven and the AI can be customized per character, and switched to AI on the fly.
  • 6 Unique death animations per character, different special moves trigger the death animations on foes.
  • Sneak kills can be made in some shadowed areas of the game.
  • Story Mode with comic book style cutscenes.
  • Fighter mode to battle out with other players or computer controlled opponents.
  • 2D animation for the characters in a 3D environment give it a unique look and feel.
  • Couch co-op, up to 4 players.
  • Unlockable characters, Fighter levels, and a secret play mode.
  • Open world to explore and discover its secrets and have encounters with the denizens of the world in the aftermath.
  • NPC character interaction and dialogue, there are branching quests and event driven dialogues that the main character can progress through.
  • Customizable difficulty, camera control, controls style, and player input!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: SteamOS or equivalent
  • Processor: Intel i5 or AMD Phenom II
  • Memory: 4096 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Any modern graphics card
  • Storage: 2000 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any modern sound card
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: SteamOS
  • Processor: Intel i7 or AMD Ryzen
  • Memory: 8192 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA 970GTX or equivalent
  • Storage: 3000 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X
  • Processor: Intel i5 or AMD Phenom II
  • Memory: 4096 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Any modern graphics card
  • Storage: 2000 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any modern sound card
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OS X
  • Processor: Intel i7 or AMD Ryzen
  • Memory: 8192 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA 970GTX or equivalent
  • Storage: 3000 MB available space

name: Lone Wolf

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5 or AMD Phenom II
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any modern graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any modern sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7 or AMD Ryzen
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA 970GTX or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: Lone Wolf: A Post Apocalyptic Beat-Em Up Role Playing Game. This action/adventure game lets a player use martial arts skills, weapons, and turn into a werewolf to fight their way through a world set in the aftermath of post nuclear devastation.

English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian
*languages with full audio support
